Well since avoiding English isn't an option, let's try t work towards improving our knowledge of English, by practicing, togetherIts time to brush up on your English skills ‼ Join us for Salt Mango Tree at 8:00 PM today  and continue your journey to master the English language. name: Salt Mango Tree #7
description: The Matrix, Terminator, I-Robot, Avengers, Transformers, Enthiran - countless movies have argued that Artificial Intelligence will enslave the Human Race. Famous personalities like Elon Musk have also expressed concern over this very fact‼ The Emergence of AI 🤖 : The beginning of the end or superstition created by years of fiction.

name: Salt Mango Tree #8
description: Speak, speak and continue to speak - that's the only true way to master a language. Ever been in awkward situations just because of your poor grasp of English. Time to fix that‼️Join us for Salt Mango Tree 🧂🥭🎄 at 8PM today on the µLearn Discord Server. Today's Topic : Chat GPT - A turning point in Tech💥 or just an overhyped Chatbot🙃

name: Salt Mango Tree #9
description: The more you practice, the better you get💯 Ever been in awkward situations just because of your poor grasp of English. Time to fix that‼️Join us for Salt Mango Tree 🧂🥭🎄 at 8PM today on Lobby. Topic : 2022 - The best, the worst or somewhere in the middle?

name: Salt Mango Tree #10
description: Friends, Students, Countrymen - Lend us your ears 🙉. Join us for Salt Mango Tree 🧂🥭🌳 today at 8PM and take one more step towards furthering your knowledge of the English Language‼️ Topic : Mastering Introductions - The first step towards success!! Mastering a language takes significant effort. Start this New Year with a resolution to master English

name: Salt Mango Tree #11
description: 📢  Calling all social media enthusiasts to join us for a conversation on “ Social media - Super Hero Or Super Villain ” . Let's discuss the advantages and disadvantages of social media and its impact on our daily lives. Venue : Lobby Voice Channel - µLearn Discord Server .Join us today at 8 p.m. sharp for an awesome discussion. Just one rule to follow: Use only English to speak
